snippet: Investigators said that a fan shaft inside the Boeing Dreamliner’s General Electric engine broke, expelling shards of hot metal and starting a fire on the ground.
abstract: National Transportation Safety Board says a fan shaft inside the Boeing Dreamliner’s General Electric engine broke during a test run, expelling shards of hot metal and starting a fire on the ground.
lead_paragraph: Investigators said that a fan shaft inside the Boeing Dreamliner’s General Electric engine broke, expelling shards of hot metal and starting a fire on the ground.

headline.seo: N.T.S.B. Finds Failed Part in Test of Boeing Dreamliner
headline.main: Board Finds What Marred Test of a 787
headline.print_headline: Board Finds What Marred Test of a 787
